items.sentence: What makes you think I want to spend Christmas with Tom?
Tom gets his drinking water from a well on his property.
I'm the only one at the hostel who doesn't speak French.
If I had enough money, I'd take a trip around the world.
There's a chance Tom didn't do what you asked him to do.
In life, there are many things more important than work.
Tom had to do a lot of things that he didn't like to do.
Leatherbacks do not have a hard shell like most turtles.
It'll be necessary to start all over from the beginning.
Tom wasn't in love with Mary. He was in love with Alice.
I hope you know the last thing I want to do is hurt you.
I know I haven't been doing what I should've been doing.
This is one of the most beautiful things I've ever seen.
From my house, it's three miles to the nearest bus stop.
All the children on the bus were shouting at the driver.
I head from Tom Mary will be coming to Boston next week.
If you saw what happened, you should contact the police.
I can't help but wonder whether Tom will really do that.
Tom is being punished for a crime that he didn't commit.
Tom was only thirteen years old when he moved to Boston.
